blocks.text: Source: AHK.docx. Target window: PowerScribe 360 | Reporting.
Sign report (Esc)
Esc signs the report (F12) inside PowerScribe; otherwise it behaves like a normal Escape key.
Toggle dictation on/off (backtick)
Backtick sends F4 to toggle dictation when PowerScribe is active; otherwise it types a literal backtick.
Go to next field (Tab)
Tab jumps to the next field inside PowerScribe; otherwise it sends a normal Tab.
Go to previous field (Shift+Tab)
Shift+Tab moves to the previous field inside PowerScribe; otherwise it sends a normal Shift+Tab.
Smart Impression (Caps Lock)
Caps Lock triggers Ctrl+Shift+1 for Smart Impression in PowerScribe; elsewhere Caps Lock behaves normally.
Hotstring: fx -> No fractures or dislocations.
Types the phrase when PowerScribe is active; inactive windows remain unaffected.

#Requires AutoHotkey v2.0
SetTitleMatchMode 2

#HotIf WinActive("PowerScribe 360 | Reporting")
::fx::No fractures or dislocations.
#HotIf
Hotstring: ptx -> No pneumothorax is identified.
Types the phrase when PowerScribe is active; other windows are unchanged.

#Requires AutoHotkey v2.0
SetTitleMatchMode 2

#HotIf WinActive("PowerScribe 360 | Reporting")
::ptx::No pneumothorax is identified.
#HotIf
